name: Demon Seal, The Ars Goetia Legends
name_original: Demon Seal, The Ars Goetia Legends
description:
Demon Seal, The Ars Goetia Legends.    A Black Magician's Companion Guide to the Lesser Key of Solomon.  It was compiled in the mid-17th century, mostly from materials originating from the centuries previous . 

Sealing the Demons, Once and For All.

Story

Goetia or Goëtia is a practice that includes the conjuration of demons. The Ancient Greek word γοητεία (goēteía) means "charm, jugglery, sorcery", from γόης (góēs) "sorcerer, wizard" (plural: γόητες góētes). The meaning of "sorcerer" is attested in a scholion, or commentary, referring to the Dactyli, a mythical race, stating that according to Pherecydes of Syros and Hellanicus of Lesbos, those to the left are goētes, while those to the right are deliverers from sorcery. 

The word may be ultimately derived from the verb γοάω "groan, bewail" (goáō). Derivative terms are γοήτευμα "a charm" (goḗteuma, plural γοητεύματα goēteúmata) and γοητεύω "to bewitch, beguile" (goēteúō).

  • Artwork:  Demons Asset Pack by emptyfortress (itch.io), Looking for an   Artist.
  • Sources:  Re-Skin for  first puzzle from:  BrimOrbs
  • In Development : Match Three and Turn Based Card Game.
